attributes.action: Stop banks from being allowed to place charge orders on unsecured loans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many banks and credit card companies are now applying for charge orders to secure an unsecured debt against your property. This should be stopped by an act of parliament.They took out the risk in the first place. Unsecured should mean what it says, UNSECURED.
